Jx.Grid.Column

Extends: Jx.Object

The class used for defining columns for grids.

Example

Summary
Jx.Grid.ColumnExtends: Jx.Object
Options
renderModeThe mode to use in rendering this column to determine its width. 
widthDetermines the width of the column when using ‘fixed’ rendering mode or acts as a minimum width when using ‘expand’ mode.
isEditableallows/disallows editing of the column contents
isSortableallows/disallows sorting based on this column
isResizableallows/disallows resizing this column dynamically
isHiddendetermines if this column can be shown or not
nameThe name given to this column if no label is specified the name is used as label
labelThe label given to this column
template
rendereran instance of a Jx.Grid.Renderer to use in rendering the content of this column or a config object for creating one like so:
Constructor
Jx.Columninitializes the column object
Functions
getHeaderHTML
getWidthreturn the width of the column
getCellWidthreturn the cellWidth of the column
calculateWidthreturns the width of the column.
isEditableReturns whether this column can be edited
isSortableReturns whether this column can be sorted
isResizableReturns whether this column can be resized
isHiddenReturns whether this column is hidden
isAttachedreturns whether this column is attached to a store.
getHTMLcalls render method of the renderer object passed in.



Options



renderMode
The mode to use in rendering this column to determine its width.  Valid options include
fitauto calculates the width for the best fit to the text.  This is the default.
fixeduses the value passed in the width option, doesn’t auto calculate.
expanduses the value in the width option as a minimum width and allows this column to expand and take up any leftover space.  NOTE: there can be only 1 expand column in a grid.  The Jx.Columns object will only take the first column with this option as the expanding column.  All remaining columns marked “expand” will be treated as “fixed”.



width
Determines the width of the column when using ‘fixed’ rendering mode or acts as a minimum width when using ‘expand’ mode.



isEditable
allows/disallows editing of the column contents



isSortable
allows/disallows sorting based on this column



isResizable
allows/disallows resizing this column dynamically



isHidden
determines if this column can be shown or not



name
The name given to this column if no label is specified the name is used as label



label
The label given to this column



template



renderer
an instance of a Jx.Grid.Renderer to use in rendering the content of this column or a config object for creating one like so:
{
    name: 'Text',
    options: { ... renderer options ... }
}



Constructor



Jx.Column
initializes the column object



Functions

getWidth: function ()

getCellWidth
getCellWidth: function()
return the cellWidth of the column



calculateWidth
calculateWidth : function (rowHeader)
returns the width of the column.
Parameters
rowHeaderflag to tell us if this calculation is for the row header

Base class for all other object in the JxLib framework.
